TheVixenMod:BurningStick.NAME: Burning Stick
DESCRIPTIONS: In the hands of the Vixen, at the start of your turn, gain #b
#rthevixenmod:Sunny_Day. NL Displays the amount of #rthevixenmod:Sunny_Day you have.
In your sloppy hands, at the start of your turn, gain #rStrength equal to the #bthevixenmod:cumulative_stacksize of your #ythevixenmod:debuffs this turn.

TheVixenMod:EternalFlame.NAME: Eternal Flame
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #gBurning #gStick. In the hands of the Vixen, at the start of your turn, gain #b
#rthevixenmod:Sunny_Day and gain #rStrength this turn equal to the leftover #rthevixenmod:Sunny_Day from last turn. NL Displays the amount of #rthevixenmod:Sunny_Day you have.
In your sloppy hands, at the start of your turn, gain #rStrength and #rDexterity equal to the #bthevixenmod:cumulative_stacksize of your #ythevixenmod:debuffs this turn.

TheVixenMod:SereneGrace.NAME: Serene Grace
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #rthevixenmod:Burn to an enemy, reduce that enemy's #rStrength by half the amount of #rthevixenmod:Burn applied until end of turn.

TheVixenMod:FiriumZ.NAME: Firium Z
TheVixenMod:FiriumZ.FLAVOR: Obtained in a fierce... dance competition.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rRight-click: Once per combat, deal damage equal to all damage dealt to all enemies this turn to target enemy. It cannot die this turn.

TheVixenMod:Charcoal.NAME: Charcoal
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage caused by #rthevixenmod:Burn is doubled. NL (the debuff you inflict, not the status card)

TheVixenMod:FlameOrb.NAME: Flame Orb
TheVixenMod:FlameOrb.FLAVOR: You need real guts to carry something like this around.
DESCRIPTIONS: #rthevixenmod:Burn is now halved instead of removed at the end of turn. NL Double the Block gained from the power #ythevixenmod:Guts.

TheVixenMod:ShellBell.NAME: Shell Bell
TheVixenMod:ShellBell.FLAVOR: Reverberates when others scream in agony.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal damage to a #rthevixenmod:burned creature, gain 3 Block.

TheVixenMod:TwistedSpoon.NAME: Twisted Spoon
TheVixenMod:TwistedSpoon.FLAVOR: Not to be confused with a strange spoon.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your cards cause enemies to deal damage to themselves, they lose 2 #rStrength this turn.

TheVixenMod:Synchronize.NAME: Synchronize
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are afflicted with #bWeak, #rVulnerable or #ytemporary #yStrengthloss, also apply it to the enemy that applied it. NL (apply it to all enemies but for half the amount if you apply it to yourself)

TheVixenMod:UmbreonRelic.NAME: Umbreon's Support
TheVixenMod:UmbreonRelic.FLAVOR: Unbreakable bonds of friendship... that will be forgotten when you start another climb.
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing 20 cards, put Umbreon into your hand. It stays there until played or discarded manually.
